products.title: Lighting Lamp
products.description: Comfortable Lighting Lamp for your living room
products.desc: Upholstered velvet ottoman with antique stud detailing. Invite restrained glamour and on-trend colour into your design scheme with the Eichholtz Ponti Ottoman. Inspired by the neo-classical influences of Italian icon, Gio Ponti, this contemporary ottoman collection is presented in a choice of velvet and linen colourways.
